name: CMGT_WFL_CaseType_ConfigureTask_Task_ConditionalWorkflowRulesSection
description: Rules section for conditional workflow rules section
sail_code:
{
  rule!CMGT_WFL_Automation_RuleSection(
    conditionSets: ri!conditionSets,
    brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
    afterTaskBranchMapIndices: ri!afterTaskBranchMapIndices,
    caseType: ri!caseType,
    visibleCaseTypeWorkflowTaskIndices: ri!visibleCaseTypeWorkflowTaskIndices,
    availableTasks: ri!availableTasks,
    previousTasks: ri!previousTasks,
    selectedCaseTypeWorkflowTask: ri!selectedCaseTypeWorkflowTask,
    uniqueAfterTaskUuidsInViolation: ri!uniqueAfterTaskUuidsInViolation,
    currentWorkflowStep: ri!currentWorkflowStep,
    fieldDetails: ri!fieldDetails,
    selectedChildConditionSetUuid: ri!selectedChildConditionSetUuid,
    caseTypeWorkflowTaskBranchMaps: ri!caseTypeWorkflowTaskBranchMaps
  ),
  /*Dependents*/
  {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
      columns: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
          contents: {
            rule!CMGT_WFL_CaseType_ConfigureTask_ListOfDependents(
              afterTaskBranchMapIndices: intersection(
                ri!afterTaskBranchMapIndices,
                rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
                  records: ri!caseTypeWorkflowTaskBranchMaps,
                  fieldValuePairs: {
                    a!map(
                      field: "taskUUID",
                      value: ri!selectedCaseTypeWorkflowTaskUuid
                    ),
                    a!map(field: "conditionSetUUID", value: null)
                  },
                  filterType: "MATCH_INDICES"
                )
              ),
              taskBehaviorTypeId: ri!taskBehaviorTypeId,
              caseType: ri!caseType,
              visibleCaseTypeWorkflowTaskIndices: ri!visibleCaseTypeWorkflowTaskIndices,
              availableTasks: ri!availableTasks,
              previousTasks: ri!previousTasks,
              brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
              taskResponseOptions: null,
              isStartTask: false,
              uniqueAfterTaskUuidsInViolation: ri!uniqueAfterTaskUuidsInViolation,
              isDisabled: false,
              dropdownLabel: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:282a94c6-5608-498b-96ff-89b11049b745",
              caseTypeWorkflowTaskBranchMaps: ri!caseTypeWorkflowTaskBranchMaps,
              isDefaultCondition: true(),
              selectedCaseTypeWorkflowTask: ri!selectedCaseTypeWorkflowTask
            )
          },
          width: "10X"
        )
      },
      alignVertical: "MIDDLE",
      marginBelow: "LESS",
      spacing: "DENSE",
      stackWhen: "NEVER"
    )
  }
}
